parse.title: Flags of the federal subjects of Russia

text.*:
Map of the federal subjects of Russia (including Crimea) with their flags

This gallery of flags of federal subjects of Russia shows the flags of the 85 federal subjects of Russia.

Contents

  • 2 Krais
  • 3 Oblasts
